description: Sporting threeBalanced Armature driver units (full range, woofer and tweeter), these audiophile-friendly in-ear headphones are buffed out for serious sound.<br>Tune into a dramatic soundscape of clear, sparkling highs and deep, bottomless lows with these XBA-3 Balanced Armature in-ear headphones. With a full-range driver, woofer and tweeter, these premium headphones sport three Sony Balanced Armature driver units precision engineered to optimize your music. Revel in incredibly crisp vocals, buffed out bass and a remarkably balanced frequency response for the ultimate earbud listening experience.<br>
title: Sony XBA-3 - 3 Drivers Balanced Armature In-ear Headphones
